}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "21514WLI2PCIA01" and "WLI2-PCI-G54S REV.:A0-2" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device is assumed to be the second revision of the card. :The original model uses BCM4306 + BCM2050.
Japanese drivers list two IDs as identifying as this device... *14e4:4318 (1154:0355) - presumed to be this device *14e4:4320 (1154:0330) - presumed to be the v1
[[Category:English Documentation]]
